pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Cursor is an AI-powered code editor built on top of Visual Studio Code. It combines the familiar VSCode interface with advanced AI capabilities for intelligent code completion, refactoring, and development assistance.
This package installs the official binary distribution from Cursor, including: - Full VSCode editor functionality - Integrated AI coding assistant with GPT-4 support - Built-in terminal and debugging tools - Extension marketplace support - Git integration - Multi-language support
The application is based on Electron and includes the Chromium runtime for rendering the user interface.

use.flag: Enable Wayland support (experimental). When enabled, provides better integration with Wayland compositors, though X11/XWayland is still supported as a fallback.
